original_text: Then the Lord told me, “Go down from here at once, because your people whom you brought out of Egypt have become corrupt. They have turned away quickly from what I commanded them and have made an idol for themselves.”
korean_text: 내게 이르시되 일어나 여기서 속히 내려가라 네가 애굽에서 인도하여 낸 네 백성이 스스로 부패하여 내가 그들에게 명령한 도를 속히 떠나 자기를 위하여 우상을 부어 만들었느니라

sentences.original_text: Go down from here at once
because your people whom you brought out of Egypt have become corrupt
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네가 이집트에서 이끌어낸 네 백성이 부패했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: They have turned away quickly from what I commanded them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내가 명령한 것을 빨리 떠났다

sentences.original_text: and have made an idol for themselves
